parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: Location of the text; pointer to an array of 3 doubles

parameters.name: Attachment
parameters.description: Justification of the text as defined in swTextJustification_e

parameters.name: WidthFactor
parameters.description: Horizontal scale factor of the text

title: IDisplayDimension.IAddDisplayText
description: Overrides the display text for this display dimension.
signature:
System.Boolean IAddDisplayText( 
   System.String
Text
,
   ref System.Double
Position
,
   TextFormat
Format
,
   System.Int32
Attachment
,
   System.Double
WidthFactor
)

parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: Location of the text; pointer to an array of 3 doubles

parameters.name: Attachment
parameters.description: Justification of the text as defined in swTextJustification_e

parameters.name: WidthFactor
parameters.description: Horizontal scale factor of the text

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks: The new graphics displayed by this method are temporary. When the user changes the dimension, this display dimension reverts back to the SOLIDWORKS standard.
